feed.title: eSIM Myanmar - Latest Updates
feed.subtitle: Stay updated with new eSIM plans and mobile data offers in Myanmar

entry.title: New 7-Day Unlimited eSIM Plan Now Available
entry.summary: Introducing our new 7-day unlimited data eSIM plan perfect for travelers visiting Myanmar. Get unlimited high-speed data with nationwide coverage.
entry.content:
We're excited to announce our new 7-day unlimited eSIM plan, designed specifically for travelers who need reliable, high-speed internet throughout Myanmar.

Plan Features:

  • Unlimited high-speed data for 7 days
  • Nationwide 4G/5G coverage
  • Instant activation via QR code
  • No roaming charges
  • 24/7 customer support

Price: $25 USD

Get this plan now
